p: The sulphur purification steps for heating, melting, and filtering are the same as method 2 [ 28]. In brief, Millettia pinnata L. oil (Karanja oil, 25 ml) and Ricinus communis oil (Erand oil, 25 ml) are mixed together and used instead of ghee. In addition, goat milk and Datura metelis L. (Dhattura patra) juice are used instead of Eclipta prostrate juice. Sulphur is filtered through the cloth into a vessel containing goat milk and Datura metelis juice thrice, respectively. Finally, sulphur is washed and dried [ 28].
